articles.author: ESPN staff
articles.title: Indiana-Ohio State live: Ohio State pulling away in second half - ESPN
articles.description: The Hoosiers lost to the Buckeyes in a Big Ten showdown. We have the highlights and breakdown.
articles.content:
A berth in the Big Ten title game, opposite the Oregon Ducks, and a higher seed in the College Football Playoff were on the line Saturday in Columbus, Ohio.
The Hoosiers have been the season's bigge… [+291 chars]
